Package org.whyisthisnecessary.eps.api

Class EPSConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.configuration.MemorySection
org.bukkit.configuration.MemoryConfiguration
org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration
org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration
org.whyisthisnecessary.eps.api.EPSConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.configuration.Configuration, org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection
public class EPSConfiguration
extends org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration
An implementation of Configuration. Meant for use for easy writing and reading of Enchantments+- configuration files.
Author:
TreuGames

      public java.lang.Double getAutofilledDouble​(java.lang.Integer enchlvl, java.lang.String path)
      Returns the value of the specified path. Automatically fills %lvl%.
      Parameters:
      enchlvl - The enchant's level
      path - The path you want to search for.
      Returns:
      Returns the double value of the specified path.

    • setDefault

      public void setDefault​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.Object value)
      Sets the path to the specified value if it isn't already set. Automatically saves.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to be set to
      value - The value to set to the path

    • autoFillEnchantConfig

      public void autoFillEnchantConfig​(java.lang.String desc, java.lang.Integer cost)
      Automatically fills the max level, scrap value, upgrade material, upgrade description, cost type, cost start value and value for easier value setting. Max level is set to 10, scrap value is set to half cost, upgrade icon is set to BOOK, upgrade description is set to the specified description (so people can understand what the enchant does), the cost type is set to linear and the start value and value is set to the specified cost.
      Parameters:
      enchant - The enchant to fill
      desc - The description to fill
      cost - The cost you want to set

    • getEnchantFile

      public java.io.File getEnchantFile()
      Returns the file which correlates to this configuration.
      Parameters:
      enchant - The correlating enchant
      Returns:
      Returns the file which correlates to the enchant's configuration.
